S.FORM: == Towic ato Aramoringit a selal == Mipatay ko Tafalong a tamdaw to Piyuma a tamdaw太巴塱人殺害卑南人 Itiya ho mipatay to Piyuma ko Tafalong a tamdw, ci Tangatang ko ngangan noya mipatayan no Tafalong. O Piyuma sato "patodong kita to nipatayan no Tafalong, miala (mipatay) kita to Tafalong " sato koya Piyuma, o Kiwit sato a tamdaw pa'ading to Tafalong, orasaka, misatalo'an i cepo' no Alangahay maherek a misatalo'an toya to a romi'ad. Ocooren no kaka a selal o Towic ato Aramoringit selal,ko kakeridan no sasafaay selal na Towic ato Aramoringit, ci Odoy Kering aci Fayo Niwac a selal, "katayra i inorong ato dimata' a misolap" han ni Towic ato Aramoringit ca Odoy Kering ato Fayo Niwac. Ci Odoy Kering aci Fayo Niwac so'elinay satalomilom sato a ma'araw ko kaitiraan no Pyuma. Cikay sato a minokay tayra i makakaay a selal a pasifana'. " iraay han＂han to no Towic ato Aramoringit, "iraay to mama" han to safa a selal ko sowal.. == Pacefaday a tilid 註解 ==

== Towic ato Aramoringit a selal == Mipatay ko Tafalong a tamdaw to Piyoma a tamdaw太巴塱人殺害卑南人 Itiya ho mipatay to Piyoma ko Tafalong a tamdw, ci Tangatang ko ngangan noya mipatayan no Tafalong. O Piyoma sato "patodong kita to nipatayan no Tafalong, miala (mipatay) kita to Tafalong " sato koya Piyoma, o Kiwit sato a tamdaw pa'ading to Tafalong, orasaka, misatalo'an i cepo' no Alangahay maherek a misatalo'an toya to a romi'ad. Ocooren no kaka a selal o Towic ato Aramoringit selal,ko kakeridan no sasafaay selal na Towic ato Aramoringit, ci Odoy Kering aci Fayo Niwac a selal, "katayra i inorong ato dimata' a misolap" han ni Towic ato Aramoringit ca Odoy Kering ato Fayo Niwac. Ci Odoy Kering aci Fayo Niwac so'elinay satalomilom sato a ma'araw ko kaitiraan no Pyoma. Cikay sato a minokay tayra i makakaay a selal a pasifana'. " iraay han＂han to no Towic ato Aramoringit, "iraay to mama" han to safa a selal ko sowal.. == Pacefaday a tilid 註解 ==
